channel.title: Client Speed?
channel.description: ok we have a download client and when we attack either players or npcs we i click to attack it takes 2-3 seconds for the attack to the begin i think its like a delay if i may say? and also the specials too like when click a spec it takes 2 or 3 seconds for it to activate? any help guys?

do u have any suggestion?[/quote]

pk and economy based is kind of hard to maintain and balance. good luck bro
